name: GSEA
description: Tests whether some gene sets are significantly enriched for a given outcome using Gene Set Enrichment Analysis.

properties.name: min_size
properties.description: Minimal size of a gene set to be considered in the analysis (default: 10)

properties.name: max_size
properties.description: Maximal size of a gene set to be considered in the analysis (default: 500)

properties.name: seed
properties.description: Random seed for result reproducibility (default -1 will be ignored.)
